scripts.network: hc s clean && npm run build:happ && npm run launch:happ
scripts.build: npm run build:happ && hc web-app pack workdir
scripts.build:happ: npm run build:dnas && hc app pack ./workdir
scripts.build:dnas: npm run build:zomes && hc dna pack ./dnas/habits/workdir
scripts.launch:happ: npm run start:precheck; dotenv -- concurrently npm:start:happ
scripts.start:happ: RUST_LOG=warn WASM_LOG=debug echo "pass" | hc launch --piped -n $AGENTS ./workdir/habit_fract.happ --ui-path ./ui/app/dist network  --bootstrap `cat .bootstrap-path` webrtc `cat .signal-path`
scripts.start:precheck: npm run start:check-local-services; npm run clean:sandbox
scripts.start:holochain-single: RUST_LOG=warn WASM_LOG=debug echo "pass" | hc s --piped -f=$VITE_ADMIN_PORT generate ./workdir/habit_fract.happ --run $VITE_APP_PORT -a habit_fract network --bootstrap `cat .bootstrap-path` webrtc `cat .signal-path`
scripts.clean: npm run clean:sandbox; npm run clean:build && npm run clean:modules
scripts.clean:build: rimraf target; npm run clean:dnas; npm run clean:happ; rimraf ui/app/dist; exit 0
